item.title: Even If There Is No Global Warming
item.description:
The debate surrounding climate change is heating up, with strong opinions on both sides. Whether or not human activity is the primary driver of global warming, shifting towards green energy makes sense for a multitude of reasons. We need to change our approach to energy consumption or face serious consequences, potentially even sooner than anticipated. The current economic downturn has provided a temporary reprieve in energy consumption, but as the economy recovers, the demand for oil will surge...
